knimeNode.name: Subsets
knimeNode.shortDescription: Generates all possible subsets of the input table's selected columns.

intro.p: Generates all possible subsets of the input table's selected columns' values.
Be careful as it generates all possible 2#different values combinations.

fullDescription.option: the columns to use in generation
do not filter out the repeats in the values if this is selected

ports.outPort: table with the generated subsets of the values
